description:
The 125 ZoneKnit™ Shorts IB Topo are highly breathable running shorts designed for warm, aerobic days outside. These lightweight shorts feature icebreaker’s ZoneKnit™ engineered body mapping, combining Cool-Lite™ jersey fabric with strategic panels of Cool-Lite™ eyelet mesh for enhanced breathability and temperature regulation when you're on the move. An elastic drawcord waist and an internal brief make for a secure, comfortable fit, while the side stash pocket and zippered back pocket secure your small essentials. The natural camo print adds a high-performance feel.

Silky-soft merino and TENCEL™ Lyocell, sourced from eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Merino 125 ZoneKnit Shorts IB Topo - Mens

specs.value: 60% Lyocell, 40% Merino Wool - Exclusive of decoration
